name: Dungeons of Ba
overview: The legend of the fabled Ba stone has attracted many a courageous adventurer...and the dungeons that hold the secret of the stone have swallowed them all!! For thousands of years the puzzle has remained unsolved. But you are a new breed of adventurer - intelligent, strong and resourceful. You accept the challenge! As you descend into the forbidding subterranean caverns, the ancient ruins collapse, destroying your only known exit. So no turning back!
